sections.heading: Goals
sections.content: A compass that guides you on what to do next.

items.item: Be debt free from student loans.
Be in a career making more than 6 figures.
Move out of state to the Pacific Northwest.
Know that I enjoy doing regarding designing and programming, and deep dive into that. To better focus on what kind of career I want to go into.
Not working at the moment, would like to get a job at the end of the year.
Be able to understand all the concepts we were taught.
Learn how to think like a designer and programmer, ask the right questions.
Have my website in a good place to be able to present it.
Finish a few projects I am working on to put in my portfolio.
Keep practicing what I know, getting faster and asking for help when I don't know something.
